tr.description:
Escape your childhood fears.

First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile!
 Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears!
Help Six escape The Maw – a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal.
As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover.
Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out!
Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design.
Sneak your way out of the Maw’s dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. 

FEATURES

- Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure
- Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants
- Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles
- Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE

- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- Compatible with MFi controllers

If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

Husha – Your Safe Haven for Emotions

Overview:
Husha is an emotional support app that blends AI with voice communication to provide a safe and private space for self-expression. Through intelligent emotion recognition and an anonymous community, every voice is gently heard, and every story receives a warm response.

Core Features:

• Emotional Resonance Channel
Discover voice posts that match your current mood through intelligent recommendations. Feel the resonance in shared emotions and realize you are never truly alone.

• Anonymous Voice Treehole
A fully anonymous voice-sharing space. No need for carefully chosen words—just express your true feelings with your voice and receive warmth and support from the community.

• Intelligent Listening Companions
Multiple AI companions with unique personalities are available 24/7. Whether you need comfort, advice, or simply someone to talk to, there’s always an AI that understands you.

• Emotional Call Connection
Connect with kind listeners through intelligent matching. Share your feelings in real-time voice calls in a safe environment and receive instant emotional support.

tr.description:
Join millions of players in this pocket monster game sequel
Embark on an epic adventure in EvoCreo 2, the ultimate monster-catching RPG set in the captivating world of Shoru. Immerse yourself in a land teeming with mythical creatures called Creo. For thousands of years, these collectible monsters have roamed the lands, their origins and evolution shrouded in mystery. Do you have what it takes to unravel the secrets of the Creo and become a legendary Evoking Master Trainer?

Uncover a Compelling Adventure Game
Begin your role playing game (RPG) journey as a new recruit in the Shoru Police Academy. Creo Monsters are disappearing, and it's your mission to uncover the truth behind these mysterious events. But there's more to the story than meets the eye in this monster game — dark plots are brewing, and your skills will be put to the test. Along the way, assist the citizens of Shoru by completing over 50 engaging missions, building alliances, and discovering hidden treasures.

Capture and Train Over 300 Monsters
Love monster-collecting games? Build your RPG dream team of Creo in this open-world role playing game. Hunt rare and legendary monsters, each available in unique alternate colors. With over 300 unique monsters to capture, evolve, and train, you’ll have endless possibilities to customize your strategy in pocket monster games. Create powerful combinations and lead your Creo to victory in thrilling turn-based battles.

Explore this monster adventure game
Experience more than 30 hours of offline and online rpg gameplay as you dive into a richly detailed open world. From dense forests to mysterious caves and bustling towns, the continent of Shoru is filled with secrets waiting to be uncovered. Adventure through diverse environments, complete challenging quests, and uncover hidden paths to legendary treasures. Explore 2 more biomes in this sequel like the desert and find many monsters on the way of your adventure. 

Master a deep and strategic RPG battle system as a monster trainer & hunter
Prepare for trainer battles with a highly customizable system. Equip your Creo with items and unlock over 100 unique traits to enhance their abilities. Train your Creo to learn and master over 200 moves, which you can swap anytime to adapt to new challenges. Face fierce opponents, manage elemental weaknesses, and use your tactical skills to gain the upper hand. Can you become a pocket monster master trainer?

Prove Yourself as the Ultimate Master Trainer
Challenge the strongest monster trainers across Shoru and rise through the ranks in this paid role playing game. Compete in the prestigious Coliseum, where only the best monster trainers are crowned as champions. Will you conquer every rpg battle and claim the title of Evoking Master Trainer?

Key Features:
- Sequel of one of the top paid role playing games worldwide
- 300+ collectible monsters to capture, train, and evolve.
- No level cap on your monsters - engaging endgame!
- A sprawling open world with 30+ hours of offline & online gameplay.
- Engaging turn-based battles with deep strategy elements.
- Hundreds of moves and traits to customize your Creo.
- Over 50 missions packed with adventure and rewards.
- Offline play—no internet required to enjoy the game.
- Stunning pixel art visuals reminiscent of classic monster RPGs.

Why Players Love EvoCreo 2:
Fans of Monster games and monster trainer RPGs will feel right at home.
A perfect mix of creature collection, exploration, and battle strategy.
Casual and hardcore gamers alike will enjoy the mix of action and adventure.

Join the adventure today and start your journey toward becoming the ultimate monster trainer in EvoCreo 2! Can you catch them all and master the secrets of the Creo?

tr.description:
Craft and plan your strategy with Vault of the Void's dynamic deckbuilding!

PC/Mobile Cross Save live now!

Vault of the Void is a single-player, low-RNG roguelike deckbuilder designed to put the power into your hands. Continuously build, transform and iterate on your deck as you progress through your run - or even before each battle, with a fixed deck size of 20 cards required before each fight.

Preview which enemies you’ll be battling before each encounter, giving you a chance to carefully plan your strategy. With no random events, your success is in your hands - and your creativity and skill define your chances of victory!

FEATURES
- Choose from 4 different classes, each one with a completely different playstyle!
- Constantly iterate on your deck with 440+ different cards!
- Battle 90+ fearsome monsters as you make your way to The Void.
- Change up your playstyle with 320+ Artifacts.
- Infuse your cards with different Void Stones - leading to endless combinations!
- PC/Mobile Crossplay: pick up where you left off at any time!
- A roguelike CCG where the power’s in your hands, and without RNG.

tr.description:
*Make sure to check if your device is supported before playing Subnautica!*

Subnautica is an underwater adventure game set on an alien ocean planet. A massive, open world full of wonder and peril awaits you!

Descend into the depths, craft equipment, pilot submarines and out-smart wildlife to explore lush coral reefs, volcanoes, cave systems, and more - all while trying to survive. Unravel the mystery of this world teeming with creatures, both friendly and hostile, scattered with clues from a previous time.

Play in Survival mode to experience the original challenge, or switch to Freedom or Creative mode to discover this oceanic planet without the pressures of thirst, hunger, or oxygen. 

FEATURES
• SURVIVE - After crash landing on a vast underwater planet, the clock is ticking to find water, food, and to develop the equipment you need to explore.
• EXPLORE - Manage your hunger, thirst, and oxygen supply as you dive into towering kelp forests, sunlit plateaus, bio-luminescent reefs, and winding cave systems.
• SCAVENGE - Collect resources from the ocean around you. Venture deeper and further to find rarer resources, allowing you to craft more advanced items.
• CRAFT - Build bases to shelter in, vehicles to pilot, tools for survival to aid you in navigating and adapting to this subaquatic landscape. 
• DISCOVER - What happened to this planet? What caused you to crash? Can you find a way to make it off the planet alive?
• CUSTOMIZE - Play in Survival mode to experience the original challenge, or switch to Freedom or Creative mode to discover this oceanic planet without the pressures of thirst, hunger, or oxygen. 

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE
• Revamped interface – exclusive mobile UI with complete touch control
• Game Center achievements
• Cloud Save – Share your progress between iOS devices
• Compatible with MFi controllers
• iPhone 16 Optimization (including Pro Max)

-----
